I don’t know. It might be that I’m an atheist, but why should any one (in this case, society) get to dictate what I can or cannot do? I’m trying to think of extreme cases of religious miscelebration (eg “celebrating” Good Friday), but I can’t immediately think of something so awful that it would be override my right to self-determination I don’t think.
